  proposition: V2X-DGW is a research paper on domain generalization for multi-agent perception under adverse weather conditions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    V2X-DGW|FOCUSES_ON|domain generalization
    V2X-DGW|STUDIES|multi-agent perception
    V2X-DGW|ADDRESSES|adverse weather conditions

    entity-entity relationships:
    V2X-DGW|BELONGS_TO|Research Paper

  proposition: A survey explores security and privacy issues in V2X communication systems.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    V2X communication systems|CHARACTERIZED_BY|security issues
    V2X communication systems|CHARACTERIZED_BY|privacy issues

    entity-entity relationships:
    Survey|INVESTIGATES|V2X communication systems

  proposition: Researchers propose a new perspective on trustworthy intelligent vehicle systems based on TRUE autonomous organizations and operations.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Intelligent vehicle systems|CHARACTERIZED_BY|trustworthy

    entity-entity relationships:
    Researchers|PROPOSE|Intelligent vehicle systems

  proposition: A study discusses security and privacy protection technology for AIoT intelligent transportation teaching systems using 5G technology.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AIoT intelligent transportation teaching systems|USES|5G technology
    AIoT intelligent transportation teaching systems|REQUIRES|security protection
    AIoT intelligent transportation teaching systems|REQUIRES|privacy protection

    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-entity relationships:
    Researchers|SURVEY|Jailbreak attacks

    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI-generated images|POTENTIAL_IMPACT|personal identity

    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative AI|ASSOCIATED_WITH|misinformation

    AI|POTENTIAL_TO_CREATE|disinformation challenges

topic: Copyright and Legal Challenges in AI

  entities:

  proposition: Concord Music Group has filed a lawsuit against Anthropic PBC.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Concord Music Group|LAWSUIT_AGAINST|Anthropic PBC

  proposition: The New York Times Company has initiated a lawsuit against Microsoft Corporation.
    entity-entity relationships:
    New York Times Company|LAWSUIT_AGAINST|Microsoft Corporation

  proposition: A research paper explores the books known to ChatGPT/GPT-4.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    ChatGPT|KNOWLEDGE_OF|books
    GPT-4|KNOWLEDGE_OF|books

  proposition: Researchers investigate copyright violations in large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large language models|POTENTIAL_FOR|copyright violations

    entity-entity relationships:
    Researchers|INVESTIGATE|Large language models

  proposition: A study examines LLM memorization through the lens of adversarial compression.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large language models|CHARACTERIZED_BY|memorization

  proposition: Researchers propose a method to leverage data-driven biases in GenAI copyright disputes.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GenAI|CHARACTERIZED_BY|data-driven biases

    entity-entity relationships:
    Researchers|PROPOSE|Method

  proposition: A research paper presents a tool for detecting copyright content misuse in LLM training.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large language models|POTENTIAL_FOR|copyright content misuse

    entity-entity relationships:
    Research paper|PRESENTS|Tool

  proposition: A study evaluates copyright takedown methods for language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Language models|REQUIRES|copyright takedown methods
